column4: Please HELP I have a problem with my video card Intel GMA 3150 I need to re-install the video drivers I am Using UBUNTU 10.4
how do I update my video driver?
and How do I know what is the name of my video Driver?
what is the driver name "VGA compatible controller: Intel Corporation N10 Family Integrated Graphics Controller?
how Do I know what is my video driver?? "lspci"  and then which one is it???
lsmod will tell you what the driver is
I do not see a video Intel Video Driver
that might mean you haven't installed one
I am getting this "E: Couldn't find package snd_hda_intel"
by any chance would you know how to restore an old driver that I had before this mess
